snippet.title: Haunted Castle 2 - Castlevania PC playthrough. No commentary walkthrough.
snippet.description:
Rating 5/10
Difficulty 9/10
This game was released on Windows before Steam existed and is horribly hard. Probably the hardest Castlevania I've played. It was done in one sitting but it was about 4 and a half hours. I died many times so I cut those out of the video to make it watchable. 
There is a terrible bug that hit me when fighting the level 9 boss where the game paused and looped the sound. I was gutted because I thought I just wasted 4 hours but after a lot of messing I realised I could get the game going again if I held the ALT key. So I put the keyboard on the floor and held it down with my big toe. Unfortunately I couldn't fix the awful sound bug which loops the last few sound effects very loudly.

Played on PC
First playthrough
No Cheats
